result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher L. Gimenez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Intentionally Point Firearm At Person [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.20(1)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and costs to be paid at time of sentencing, unless payment arrangements are approved.  Penalty for non-payment shall be entry of civil judgment.   Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees.  Send payments to:  Clerk of Courts, Room 419, 415 Jackson Street, P O Box 2808, Oshkosh WI  54903-2808.

consecutive with good time and credit for 3 days time served.    Huber granted, if in compliance with jail facility regulations.  Defendant shall report to the Work Release Unit (M-F/7:30 am to 3:30 pm), within 72 hours of sentence date with a copy of the minute sheet and the completed GPS application to establish report date for serving sentence.  Report date shall be within 60 days of sentence date.  Huber shall be revoked for failure to report and a warrant shall be authorized.

  Defendant shall provide a DNA sample by CALLING the Winnebago County Jail, Work Release Unit, WITHIN 72 HOURS, to set up an appointment during the hours of 8:00 a.m. - 4:00. p.m. Monday through Friday, at 920-232-1915 or 920-232-1919.  Defendant shall provide proof of identification along with the court minutes stating a DNA sample is required.  Failure to comply with this order may result in either a finding of contempt of court or a criminal charge of Failure to Provide a DNA Sample pursuant to Wis. Stats., 946.52.

1-20-16 Motion hearing held.  Court grants motion for return of property (weapon/gun) to Tiffany Gimenez.  Property shall be returned to above listed name.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher L. Gimenez
